title: Policy Exception Request
description: A developer requests a temporary exception to the security policy that blocks outbound traffic so they can connect to a new third-party API for testing.

tasks.description: Receive the policy exception request, including the business justification and the specific IP address and port required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly processes the incoming request.

tasks.description: Assess the risk of granting the exception, including researching the reputation of the third-party IP address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst determines the risk is acceptable for a limited time.

tasks.description: Approve the request for a limited duration (e.g., 1 week) and create a temporary firewall rule to allow the traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst grants the time-bound exception and implements the required technical control.
